channel.title: Rare Specimen hat trouble
channel.description: I grabbed the hat from the cargo crate and now I'm in the room with the giant teleporter column with numbered portals and rotating platforms. The problem comes when I try to go through the portals with the hat. Whenever the hat goes through the first portal and lands on a platform, I can't pick it up. I can shoot it, and I can give it a good whack, but I cannot actually hold it unless it falls off the platform and onto the floor, at which point I can pick it up again. I have tried throwing it through the portal instead, I've tried waiting a bit after I send it through before heading in myself, but I continue to have this problem. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
